plugin.name: Hyperlinks
plugin.author: Nyano
plugin.purpose: Makes web and email addresses on a line into hyperlinks.

muclient.script: function OnHyperlink(name, line, wildcards, styles) local hyperlinks = {} local new_style = {} local i = 1 local hyperlink_count = 0 local doingURL = 0 while i <= table.getn(styles) do -- Doesn't use pairs() because of problems with field-injection. if (doingURL == 0) then cut = string.find(styles[i].text, "([hHtTpPsSmMaAiIlLoO]+://[%S]*[%w#/])") if (cut == nil) then table.insert(new_style, {textcolour = styles[i].text_colour, background_colour = styles[i].background_colour, style = styles[i].style, text = styles[i].text}) else table.insert(new_style, {textcolour = styles[i].text_colour, background_colour = styles[i].background_colour, style = styles[i].style, text = string.sub(styles[i].text, 1, cut - 1)}) table.insert(styles, i + 1, {textcolour = styles[i].text_colour, background_colour = styles[i].background_colour, style = styles[i].style, text = string.sub(styles[i].text, cut)}) doingURL = 1 hyperlink_count = hyperlink_count + 1 end else cut, length, temp = string.find(styles[i].text, "^([%S]*[%w#/])") if (cut ~= nil) then if (hyperlinks[hyperlink_count] ~= nil) then hyperlinks[hyperlink_count] = hyperlinks[hyperlink_count]..temp else hyperlinks[hyperlink_count] = temp end table.insert(new_style, {textcolour = styles[i].text_colour, background_colour = styles[i].background_colour, style = styles[i].style, text = string.sub(styles[i].text, 1, length), hypernumber = hyperlink_count}) styles[i].text = string.sub(styles[i].text, length + 1) if (styles[i].text ~= "") then i = i - 1 doingURL = 0 else doingURL = 1 end else doingURL = 0 i = i - 1 end end i = i + 1 end for x, y in ipairs(new_style) do NoteStyle(y.style) if (y.hypernumber ~= nil) then Hyperlink(hyperlinks[y.hypernumber], y.text, "Go to "..hyperlinks[y.hypernumber], RGBColourToName(y.text_colour), RGBColourToName(y.background_colour), 1) else ColourTell(RGBColourToName(y.text_colour), RGBColourToName(y.background_colour), y.text) end end end
